requirements.summary: Implement Start button that increments the start count
acceptanceCriteria: Start button is visible and clickable
Clicking Start increments the start count by 1
Start count persists across page refreshes

file_operations.description: Add Start button that calls the backend clickStart method and updates the local state with the returned count

requirements.summary: Implement No Start button that increments the no-start count
acceptanceCriteria: No Start button is visible and clickable
Clicking No Start increments the no-start count by 1
No-start count persists across page refreshes

file_operations.description: Add No Start button that calls the backend clickNoStart method and updates the local state with the returned count

requirements.summary: Implement Reset button that clears both counts to zero
acceptanceCriteria: Reset button is visible and clickable
Clicking Reset sets both start and no-start counts to 0
Reset action persists across page refreshes

file_operations.description: Add Reset button that calls the backend resetCounts method and updates local state to show zero counts

requirements.summary: Display the total number of starts on the page
acceptanceCriteria: Start count is clearly labeled and visible
Count updates immediately after Start button is clicked
Count displays as an integer

file_operations.description: Add a clearly labeled display for the start count that shows the current value as an integer and updates immediately when the count changes

requirements.summary: Display the total number of no-starts on the page
acceptanceCriteria: No-start count is clearly labeled and visible
Count updates immediately after No Start button is clicked
Count displays as an integer

file_operations.description: Add a clearly labeled display for the no-start count that shows the current value as an integer and updates immediately when the count changes

requirements.summary: Calculate and display the start percentage with multiple decimal places
acceptanceCriteria: Percentage is calculated as (starts / (starts + no-starts)) × 100
Percentage displays with at least 2 decimal places (e.g., 66.67%)
Percentage updates immediately when either count changes
When total attempts is zero, display 0.00% or appropriate message

file_operations.description: Add percentage calculation logic that computes (starts / (starts + no-starts)) × 100 and displays the result with at least 2 decimal places, handling the zero-attempts case appropriately

requirements.summary: Design a clean, minimalist interface with warm earth tones and modern typography
acceptanceCriteria: Interface uses a cohesive color palette with warm earth tones
Typography is clear and readable with modern sans-serif fonts
Layout provides generous whitespace and visual breathing room
Overall aesthetic feels calm and purpose-built for tracking

file_operations.description: Update global styles to implement a warm earth tone color palette (terracotta, sage green, cream) with modern sans-serif typography and establish CSS custom properties for consistent theming
Extend the Tailwind theme with custom colors matching the warm earth tone palette (terracotta, sage green, cream) and configure typography settings for a modern sans-serif font stack
Apply the warm earth tone theme with generous spacing, modern typography, and a calm minimalist layout that provides visual breathing room and a focused tracking experience
